Game.Name: Drake & Josh (USA) (En,Fr)
Game.plot: Misfit brothers, Drake & Josh have enough trouble with school, girls and their crafty, mischievous little sister who is always playing pranks on them. But with Drake's new gig coming up, Josh's new promotion and some surprise visitors, trouble will have a whole new meaning.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/938089.htmlCheat: Episode passwordsEnter these passwords in the 'password' at the Main Menu.Cheat: Episode passwordsEnter these passwords to go to the desired level
Game.Notes: The Drake & Josh videogame follows the lives of two very different step-brothers and their crazy adventures with school, girls and their crafty sister Megan. In the game, players interact with all of their favorite characters from the show, including Drake and Josh, in a variety of modes featuring problem solving, stealth, strategy and action-style gameplay.
